description: Ari byiza ko buri muntu wese agana ikigo nderabuzima cyangwa ikigo gishinzwe gupima no gutanga inama ku cyorezo cya SIDA, kugirango apimwe, amenye uko ahagaze maze ahabwe inamaku buryo bwo kwirinda no guku-mira SIDA kandi arangirwe aho yasanga izo serivisi n’ibindi yakenera.
title: Ari byiza ko buri muntu wese agana ikigo nderabuzima cyangwa ikigo gishinzwe gupima no gutanga inama ku cyorezo cya SIDA, kugirango apimwe, amenye uko ahagaze maze ahabwe inamaku buryo bwo kwirinda no
content:
Ari byiza ko buri muntu wese agana ikigo nderabuzima cyangwa ikigo gishinzwe gupima no gutanga inama ku cyorezo cya SIDA, kugirango apimwe, amenye uko ahagaze maze ahabwe inamaku buryo bwo kwirinda no guku-mira SIDA kandi arangirwe aho yasanga izo serivisi n’ibindi yakenera.

Ni ngombwa ko abana, ingimbi n’abangavu bigishwa hakiri kare ibyerekeye SIDA. Iyo umwana agimbutse, yaba umuhungu cyangwa umukobwa aba akeneye amakuru nyayo kandi yose arebana no gufata no guhitamo ibyemezo byerekeye ubuzima bwe. Ibyo bizamufasha kwirinda kwandura virusi itera SIDA n’izindi ndwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabit-sina.
